com.metreeca.form.things

Class Shapes

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.metreeca.form.things.Shapes

  • public final class Shapes
extends Object
    Shape utilities.

    Supports splitting/merging of combo shapes describing LDP containers and associated resources.

    In combo shapes a container shape is connected to a set of resource shapes through ldp:contains fields.

    The LDP profile of the container is identified by its rdf:type and LDP properties, as inferred either from metadata annotations or field constraints in the combo shape, defaulting to the Basic profile if no metadata is available:

    rdf:type container profile container properties
    ldp:BasicContainer Basic â€“
    ldp:DirectContainer Direct
    • ldp:hasMemberRelation
    • ldp:isMemberOfRelation
    • ldp:membershipResource
    ldp:IndirectContainer Indirect
    • all Direct properties
    • ldp:insertedContentRelation

    Warning / Only Basic/Direct profiles are currently supported.

    See Also:
    Linked Data Platform 1.0

    • Method Detail

      • entity

        public static Shape entity(Shape shape)
        Retrieves the entity section of a shape.
        Parameters:
        shape - the shape whose entity section is to be retrieved
        Returns:
        the input shape extended with annotations for LDP container properties
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if shape is null

      • container

        public static Shape container(Shape shape)
        Retrieves the container section of a shape.
        Parameters:
        shape - the shape whose container section is to be retrieved
        Returns:
        the input shape extended with annotations for LDP container properties and pruned of ldp:contains fields, if at least one is actually included; an empty shape, otherwise
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if shape is null

      • resource

        public static Shape resource(Shape shape)
        Retrieves the resource section of a shape.
        Parameters:
        shape - the shape whose resource section is to be retrieved
        Returns:
        the conjunction of the shapes associated to ldp:contains fields in the input shape, if at least one is actually included; the source shape, otherwise; extended with annotations for LDP container properties in either cases
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if shape is null

      • resource

        public static Shape resource(Resource resource,
                             Shape shape)
        Creates an anchored resource shape.
        Parameters:
        resource - the resource the shape must be anchored to
        shape - the shape to be anchored to resource
        Returns:
        a shape extending the input shape with a filtering-only constraint stating that the focus is expected to include the anchoring resource
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if either resource or shape is null

      • container

        public static Shape container(Resource container,
                              Shape shape)
        Creates an anchored container shape.
        Parameters:
        container - the container the shape must be anchored to
        shape - the shape to be anchored to container
        Returns:
        a shape extending the input shape with filtering-only constraints connecting focus resources to the anchoring container as required by the LDP container profile identified using metadata annotations
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if either container or shape is null
